name: OpnForm
description: Beautiful open source form builder with AI-powered features. Self-hosted alternative to Typeform, Google Forms.

variables.name: Application URL
variables.description: The full URL where your OpnForm will be accessible (e.g., https://forms.yourdomain.com)

variables.name: Frontend URL
variables.description: The full URL for the frontend (usually same as APP_URL)

variables.name: Application Key
variables.description: Laravel application key (base64 encoded 32 character random string). Generate with: php -r "echo 'base64:'.base64_encode(random_bytes(32));"

variables.name: JWT Secret
variables.description: JWT secret key for authentication (64 character random string)

variables.name: Database Password
variables.description: Password for the PostgreSQL database

variables.name: Mail From Address
variables.description: Email address used for sending emails

variables.name: Frontend API Secret
variables.description: Secret key for frontend to backend communication (64 character random string)

variables.name: Redis Password
variables.description: Password for Redis (recommended to set a strong password)

variables.name: Port
variables.description: Port to expose the application on

variables.name: Mail Driver
variables.description: Mail driver (smtp, sendmail, mailgun, ses, postmark)

variables.name: SMTP Host
variables.description: SMTP server hostname

variables.name: SMTP Port
variables.description: SMTP server port

variables.name: SMTP Username
variables.description: SMTP authentication username

variables.name: SMTP Password
variables.description: SMTP authentication password

variables.name: File Storage Driver
variables.description: File storage driver (local, s3)

variables.name: AWS Access Key ID
variables.description: AWS access key for S3 storage (if using S3)

variables.name: AWS Secret Access Key
variables.description: AWS secret key for S3 storage (if using S3)

variables.name: AWS S3 Bucket
variables.description: S3 bucket name (if using S3)

variables.name: OpenAI API Key
variables.description: OpenAI API key for AI-powered features

variables.name: hCaptcha Site Key
variables.description: hCaptcha site key for form protection

variables.name: hCaptcha Secret Key
variables.description: hCaptcha secret key for form protection

variables.name: Amplitude Code
variables.description: Optional: Your Amplitude tracking code for analytics

variables.name: Crisp Website ID
variables.description: Optional: Your Crisp chat widget website ID

variables.name: Google Analytics Code
variables.description: Optional: Your Google Analytics tracking code
